directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Bears have a firm grip on the leading GameFi tokens, with the majority of them in the red.
Bitcoin Cash price outperforms the crypto market as BCH movement drops 96%. On-chain data and smart money flow point to a possible 11%...
Bitcoin Cash defies market trends, experiencing an unexpected price surge amidst declining transactions, highlighting resilient trading...
Crypto market remains under sustained bearish pressure as weak demand and low confidence dominate price action into year-end.
Bitcoin bulls are putting up a fight on Friday to break this week's choppy action that has capped all advances at around $90000.

hypothesis_content.title: News-Induced Volatility Breakout Fade (Counter-Trend)
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, a sharp price breakout (>5% in 2 hours) driven by a identifiable, high-impact news headline (e.g., regulatory, macro) will see a significant retracement (fade) of at least 50% of the initial spike within the next 24 hours, as the initial emotional reaction is overdone and lacks sustained buying.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In a neutral, range-bound market, liquidity is often thin at extremes. News triggers stop-runs and knee-jerk reactions. Without a underlying regime shift (to Bull/Bear), the move lacks the sustained order flow to continue, leading to a high probability of mean reversion as market makers and algos fade the illiquid move.
entry_conditions: BTC price moves > |5%| within a 2-hour window
Move is contemporaneous with a major news event (headline sentiment score > |0.7|)
1-hour RSI(14) on the breakout timeframe > 80 for up moves or < 20 for down moves

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial 2-hour spike range
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends beyond the initial spike high/low by 1%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The 50% retracement target is hit less than 60% of the time before the stop-loss or time exit is triggered, indicating the news catalyst is more structural and leads to a genuine trend change.
